text: Pontegrande-Sant'AndreaStatuto comunale di Calci, Art. 4. is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Calci, province of Pisa. The village is composed by the two hamlets of Pontegrande and Sant'Andrea a Lama. It is about 11 km from Pisa and almost 1 km from the municipal seat of La Pieve in Calci. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Pisa
title: Pontegrande-Sant'Andrea
